Config (autotransform.schema.config)

A set of configuration options for a schema.

class autotransform.schema.config.Config(name: str, allowed_validation_level: autotransform.validator.base.ValidationResultLevel = ValidationResultLevel.NONE)

Bases: object

An object containing all configuration information for a Schema.

allowed_validation_level

The allowed level of validation issues. Any issues raised above this level will trigger exceptions.

Type

ValidationResultLevel

name

The unique name of the schema.

Type

str

allowed_validation_level: autotransform.validator.base.ValidationResultLevel
bundle() → Dict[str, Any]

Bundles the configuration for JSON encoding.

Returns

The bundled configuration.

Return type

Dict[str, Any]

classmethod from_data(data: Dict[str, Any]) → autotransform.schema.config.Config

Produces a Config from supplied options.

Parameters

data (Dict[str, Any]) – The options from a bundled Config.

Returns

The configuration represented by the provided data.

Return type

Config

name: str
